alert.note: Alert for Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 4:54PM CDT until July 13 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wilbarger County in northern Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 453 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oklaunion, moving east at 10 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was approaching Lockett from the west, also moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Oklaunion, Lockett, and Harrold. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
